org.netbeans.spi.editor.document

Interface OnSaveTask.Factory

  • Enclosing interface:
    OnSaveTask

    @MimeLocation(subfolderName="OnSave")
public static interface OnSaveTask.Factory
    Factory for creation of on-save task. It should be registered in MimeLookup by using mime registration e.g.
    @MimeRegistration(mimeType="", service=OnSaveTask.Factory.class, position=300)
    Optional 'position' parameter may be used to force an order of tasks. Currently there are two default global factories:
    • Reformat before save uses position=500.
    • Trailing-whitespace-removal task uses position=1000.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OnSaveTask createTask(OnSaveTask.Context context)
      Create on-save task.

    • Method Detail

      • createTask

        OnSaveTask createTask(@NonNull
                      OnSaveTask.Context context)
        Create on-save task.
        Parameters:
        context - non-null context containing info for the task.
        Returns:
        task instance or null if the task is not appropriate for the given context.
